articles.author: Paul67
articles.description: Celtic’s summer spend continued yesterday with the arrival of 23-year-old Swedish central defender Gustaf Lagerbielke from Elfsborg for a reported £3m fee.  At 1.93m, Gustav is tall, 8cm taller than Cameron Carter-Vickers and Maik Nawrocki, only Christopher Jullien (1.96m) was taller in recent times. Across the squad Celtic are a small team.  Purists who still [...]
articles.title: Lagerbielke arrives not a minute too soon

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: GUSTAF LAGERBIEKLE sealed his five-year deal to Celtic from Elsborg yesterday, as CQN reported. The 23-year-old Swedish international centre-back became Brendan Rodgers’ sixth signing ahead of the August 31 transfer deadline. Lagerbiekle, who cost something in the region of £3million, is the latest in the second time-around Hoops manager’s rebuilding of the treble-winning squad which [...]
articles.title: GUSTAF THE SIXTH – NOW FOR No.7

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: THE nearest Matt O’Riley got to Champions League action two years ago was to switch on his television. Now the gifted playmaker, who was signed for a modest £1.5million from English third-tier outfit MK Dons in January 2022, insists Celtic can make an impact among Europe’s elite this season. London-born O’Riley is looking forward to [...]
articles.title: ‘I REALLY BELIEVE WE CAN BEAT ANYBODY,’ O’RILEY EURO BOAST

articles.description: CELTIC are preparing to thrash out new deals with Reo Hatate and Liel Abada. Hatate and Abada have been been involved in transfer speculation this summer and Brendan Rodgers [...]
articles.title: CELTIC IN DOUBLE DEAL BID

articles.description: BOBBY MURDOCH went through all sorts of agonies as Celtic gatecrashed the European big-time in Lisbon. The club legend, who would have been 79 today, was a thoughtful midfielder with a delightful touch [...]
articles.title: ‘I LOOKED DOWN, MY ANKLE WAS TWICE THE SIZE IT WAS AT KICK-OFF,’ BOBBY MURDOCH, MAN OF THE MATCH IN LISBON

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: NEW Bhoy Gustaf Lagerbielke revealed he was “pushing for it to happen” as soon as he heard Celtic were interested in signing him. Should Panathinaikos reach the group [...]
